content: to marker decrease 5 k3 ssk k4 p3 repeat to marker decrease 6 k3 ssk k3 p2tog p1 repeat to marker decrease 7 ssk k1 ssk k2 p2 repeat to marker decrease 8 ssk ssk k1 p2 repeat to marker decrease 9 k1 ssk p2tog repeat to marker decrease 10 ssk p1 repeat to marker cut yarn leaving 8 inch tail thread through all stitches and fasten_off on wrong side looks really great with ombre yarn child size made with size 5 needles and caron simply soft gives circumference of 16 to 20 inches
